TextView.android:text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
Success is not counted by how high you have climbed but by how many people you brought with you.
Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Success isn’t something that just happens – success is learned, success is practiced and then it is shared.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won’t taste good.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
– Dr. A P J Abdul Kalam
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
If you have no critics you’ll likely have no success.
It’s fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is a progress; working together is a success.
Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.
Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
A leader is a dealer in hope.
Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will.
We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
Growth is the only evidence of life.
Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
Shadows cannot see themselves in the mirror of the sun.
I like nonsense; it wakes up the brain cells.
I don’t go around regretting things that don’t happen.
Our patience will achieve more than our force.
Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
That’s the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet.
Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
Every word has consequences. Every silence, too.
A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Progress is man’s ability to complicate simplicity.
Be nice to people on your way up because you’ll meet them on your way down.
I don’t want other people to decide who I am. I want to decide that for myself.
We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
Respect yourself if you would have others respect you.
One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.
I don’t want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.
There is no respect for others without humility in one’s self.
Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
Nothing ever becomes real till it is experienced.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned.
The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
Experience is one thing you can’t get for nothing.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
Great is the guilt of an unnecessary war.
We don’t need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful.
When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
When a goal matters enough to a person, that person will find a way to accomplish what at first seemed impossible.
You can’t let praise or criticism get to you. It’s a weakness to get caught up in either one.
Worry often gives a small thing a great shadow.
I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
If you can see the positive sides of everything, you’ll be able to live a much richer life than others.
Be the type of person you want to meet.
I’ve seen God. He bats at no. 4 for India in tests.
Dravid could play attacking cricket like me but I could never play like him
I would go to war with Dhoni by my side
On the off-side, first there is God, then Sourav Ganguly
After doing 5 selfies with people this morning before 8 am on my morning walk I’ve come to the conclusion that the autograph is dead!
They’d win the first four Tests and we’d try to nick one at the end when they were all drunk.
What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
As I ran up to bowl, Bradman seemed to know where the ball was going to pitch, what stroke he was going to play and how many runs he was going to score.
I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
99% of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses.
Every day, do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
I’d rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not done.
Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
Life would be tragic if it weren’t funny.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth and faithfulness the best relationship.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.’
Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
Don’t find fault, find a remedy.
